name: grid-in-js
description: Make a reliable CSS Grid framework at the snap of a function.

scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:npm && npm run deploy:website
scripts.deploy:website: npm run build && cd website && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.deploy:npm: npm run build && npm login && npm publish
scripts.prepare: npm run build && cd website && npm i && cd ..
scripts.start: npm run  && concurrently "rollup -c -w" "cd website && npm run dev"
